card.body1: Quicksilver is free and open source and will always remain that way. No 'powerpack' or 'pro' version â€“ just good healthy open source.
card.body2: That said, we rely on donations to help cover hosting costs, domain renewals, and development resources.
card.description: Support the Quicksilver Project by donating today.
card.title: Make a Donation

description: Quicksilver is free and open source, developed by volunteers. Your donation helps keep the project alive.
